inclusion.criterion: Incomplete SCI graded as AIS A,B,C & D
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Level of lesion: T10 and above, based on AIS level determination by the PI, with preservation of conus function
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The intact distance between the cone and the lesion must be at least 60mm
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Focal spinal cord disorder caused by either trauma or epidural, subdural or intramedullary bleeding
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to stand with walker or 2 crutches
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Stable medical and physical condition as considered by Investigators
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate care-giver support and access to appropriate medical care in patient's home community
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Agree to comply in good faith with all conditions of the study and to attend all required study training and visits
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Must participate in two training sessions before enrolment
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Limitation of walking function based on accompanying (CNS) disorders (systemic malignant disorders, cardiovascular disorders restricting physical training, peripheral nerve disorders)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient who has spinal canal stenosis
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient who uses an intrathecal Baclofen pump.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 60-year-old Spanish man presenting with shortness of breath. He has COPD and smokes 20 cigarettes per day.
